title: Authentic Assessment Design in Higher Education: Integrating Theory and Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners, as general citizens with advanced expertise in social studies, engage in project-based assessments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can design higher education assessment tools using three theoretical perspectives: psychological authenticity, ontological fidelity, and practice theory.
Learners develop project-based assignments linked to real-world professional environments by applying learning design-based assessment methods.
Learners operate authentic assessment processes suitable for small learner groups using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
